Nominated by Chef Melissa, meet this week’s employee spotlight: Roberto Mendoza from our Culinary team. Roberto has worked as a cooler expediter for Blue Plate for eleven years and is a cheerful part of the Blue Plate family. He’s great at making others smile and laugh and says he enjoys the people he works with and loves that the company sponsors a Blue Plate soccer team. (It's true!) #hardworking #meetourpeople #holidayspirit

Hey network! We're representing an awesome engineer who has seven years of native iOS experience, works with both swift and objective-c, owns his own consulting company, and has also done contracts with some impressive development companies in the Chicago area. If your company is looking for a senior iOS engineer with a great personality, message me directly. There's nothing better than a new position for the holidays!

.Net developers looking to evolve their careers?  I have Junior, Mid, and Senior Level opportunities available. All of which have direct trajectory for advancement within established companies. Reach-out to me directly.
*Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis. No C2C available at this time*

Hi Network! I'm working with a really great consulting company that is looking for an AWS Engineer that has Atlassian tool experience (JIRA, Bitbucket, Confluence, FishEye, Bamboo). Being client facing and coming from a consulting background is a huge plus. Can hit up to $160K with great benefits and schedule flexibility.  Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis. Message me for more details!

Nominated by Senior Advisor Beth Hayes (last week’s spotlight), meet Chef de Cuisine, Melissa Chickerneo. Melissa is a hard-working, talented graduate of the Culinary Institute of America we have been lucky to have in our company the past ten years. She loves that catering allows her to prepare different cuisines every day, which pushes her to explore new ingredients, techniques and styles of food. This February, she will be traveling to South Korea where she will be cooking at the Olympics for the third time! Good luck, Melissa! #meetourpeople #gratitude #employeespotlight

Know any SQL/BI developers looking around for a new opportunity in the Western burbs? I'm working with one of Chicago's newest billion dollar companies and they're looking to add to the team. Message me directly!
*Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis. No C2C available at this time*

Specializing in placing system DevOps and Cloud engineersJobspring Partners is a professional IT staffing agency that takes an innovative approach to matching the most qualified IT professionals with organizations that offer rewarding full-time and contract career opportunities. We use a team-based approach to recruiting and work exclusively in the technology communities of ten major North American cities. With a deep understanding of the technology job market, we are able to identify opportunities that best serve the needs of people looking to advance their careers.We go the extra mile to help excellent candidates connect with companies that are looking to hire them. One of the ways we do this is through Tech in Motion, a national event series created by Jobspring that connects tech enthusiasts in ten North American cities. We work around the clock to assist candidates who want to take the next step in their careers. We take the time to meet with each of them individually to better understand their skills and unique needs. We openly invite you to experience our personalized recruiting approach so that we may help you find your next career destination.Linux, Windows, IIS, Apache, Tomcat, NginX, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQL, Powershell, Python, Ruby, Bash, chef, puppet, ansible, salt, terraform, Jenkins, Bamboo, CircleCI, Docker, Vagrant, Git, Go, Subversion, TeamCity, AWS, Azure, Rackspace, Google Cloud, OpenStack, Cisco, Juniper, SIEM, IDS, IPS, Vulnerability Management, Incident Response, Pen Testing, Ethical hacking, red team, blue team, Application Security, Network SecurityWe specialize in contract, contract to hire and permanent roles. Let me help you find an awesome job.
